timeline.message: SO-4039: initial implementation of query labeler request

timeline.bodyText: The fact that this builder only accepts the literals SnomedConcept.Expand.FULLY_SPECIFIED_NAME or SnomedConcept.Expand.SYNONYM should be documented somewhere - users of this request might think that it works with a type SCTID.
timeline.author: apeteri

replies.bodyText: Yes, it will be :) in the javadoc of the setDescriptionType method.
replies.author: cmark
